title: The Good Die Twice
description: Chase Dagger is a private detective with no past, a sometime fiancee, a scarlet macaw with a brain and an attitude, and a beautiful assistant with unusual talents. When a client receives a phone call from his wife, he seeks Dagger's assistance. The case doesn't seem that strange to Dagger until his client informs him his wife has been dead for five years.
author: Lee Driver
